alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 7:40PM MST until January 08 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow has mostly ended across the range, and therefore the Winter Storm Warning has been cancelled. For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow expected Friday with snow developing Friday night. Total snow accumulations of up to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains West. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel over passes will be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow is likely to significantly reduce visibility down to a tenth of a mile at times. People recreating in the backcountry could become disoriented.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
